expert_cases.title: VLAN Segmentation Strategy for Security
expert_cases.content:
Proper VLAN segmentation is fundamental for network security. Implement micro-segmentation with dynamic VLANs, use 802.1X for authentication-based VLAN assignment, and deploy private VLANs for additional isolation.

Security Focus: VLANs are your first line of defense - design them with security as the primary concern.

Implementation: Consider VLAN scalability limits and plan for future growth.
